document_data.name: Bandore
document_data.mainbody: '''Bandores''' were bass-range musical instruments similar to [[cittern]]s.
document_data.Description: The sound of the bandore was rich and mellow, and it was capable of reaching lower notes than usual citterns which made them good accompanying instruments for quieter voices. Bandores typically had scalloped sides that were said to enrich their sound. They were available for purchase through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]''.

Notable bandores.[[Fochlucan bandore]]: One of the seven [[Instrument of the Bards|Instruments of the Bards]]. Magical bandores that contained nature-based magic, as well as other magical powers.

Notable Users.Individuals: * [[Bonnie Harper]], a member of the [[bard]]ic group [[Adagio Jones and The Goodwinds]], had a bandore that she played for mock music and songs that involved the group's string ensemble.<ref>{{Cite polyhedron/54/The New Rogues Gallery: Adagio Jones and The Goodwinds|7}}
